ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste
instructions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a small bowl, stir together the orange juice, soy sauce, onion soup mix and garlic powder; set aside.
Place chicken thighs into a 9x13 inch glass baking dish.
Pour the orange juice mixture over.
Bake, uncovered, for 1 hour and 30 minutes in the preheated oven, basting every half hour.
If using boneless chicken, reduce cooking time to 1 hour.
title: Bev's Orange Chicken
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

In a small bowl, stir together the orange juice, soy sauce, onion soup mix and garlic powder; set aside. Rinse chicken, and pat dry. Place chicken thighs into a 9x13 inch glass baking dish. Pour the orange juice mixture over.
Bake, uncovered, for 1 hour and 30 minutes in the preheated oven, basting every half hour. If using boneless chicken, reduce cooking time to 1 hour.
